definition: complicated/many/in great numbers/abbr. for 繁體|繁体[fan2 ti3], traditional form of Chinese characters
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua

sentences.english: For starters, it's being held in the gymnasium at Valley High School, a few miles from the Strip.
sentences.chinese: 訓練在山谷高中已經有一陣子，距離繁華區有幾英里。

sentences.english: The busiest shopping area is Oxford Street, where famous large department stores are located.
sentences.chinese: 最繁華的購物區是擁有著名大百貨公司的牛津街。

sentences.english: This is the busiest street in the city. It‘s the commercial and cultural center here.
sentences.chinese: 這是這兒最繁華的街道，是本市的商業和文化中心。

sentences.english: This district is getting more and more prosperous and bustling.
The curtain frequency volume, volume as the world prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 幽簾頻卷，卷盡了凡塵繁華。

sentences.english: Spring is definitely a busy life picture.
sentences.chinese: 春，絕對是一幅飽蘸着生命繁華的畫卷。

sentences.english: Wangfujing is one of the busiest streets in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 王府井是北京最繁華的街道之一。

sentences.english: There are malls in Shanghai richer than any American counterpart.
sentences.chinese: 上海的商業街比美國任何同類都要繁華。

sentences.english: An oasis of rest and business in a bustling city.
sentences.chinese: 是繁華都市中休閒與商業的綠洲。

sentences.english: In ancient times, the neighborhood outside the city gate was the most prosperous area of this city.
sentences.chinese: 古代，關廂一帶是這座城市最繁華的地方。

sentences.english: Once, Pompeii was a busy city of 22000 people.
sentences.chinese: 以前，龐培是一個擁有兩萬兩千人口的繁華城市。

sentences.english: Somebody laid the mountains low while the town got high.
sentences.chinese: 有人把山剷平的同時，城鎮越來越繁華。

sentences.english: On the flourishing land, we turn the tears we had on the way into the treasure-trove.
sentences.chinese: 在繁華的岸上，把沿途的淚光，都埋成了寶藏。

sentences.english: It's a busy city with a large population.
sentences.chinese: 它是一個擁有大量人口的繁華都市。

sentences.english: The company is located in downtown lots Mackay, Hongkong garden nearby.
sentences.chinese: 本公司地處繁華地段麥凱樂後，香港花園附近。

sentences.english: Prostitutes still appear in all prosperous streets at night.
sentences.chinese: 流鶯依舊出入各條繁華的街道。

definition: mien/bearing/grace/amorous feelings/flirtatious expressions/local conditions and customs/wind force, direction etc
endless stream of horse and carriages (idiom)/heavy traffic
lanterns red, wine green (idiom); feasting and pleasure-seeking/debauched and corrupt environment
